statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_type FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating FROM suppliers WHERE risk_level='high';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, business_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_type='Electronics' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE performance_rating >= 8.0 AND risk_level='low' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, performance_rating FROM suppliers WHERE risk_level = 'medium' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, business_location FROM suppliers WHERE performance_rating > 7.0 AND risk_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE risk_level = 'low' AND business_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 5.0 AND 8.0 ORDER BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_type FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, risk_level FROM suppliers WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE delivery_time_days <= 5;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_type, performance_score FROM suppliers INNER JOIN performance_data ON suppliers.supplier_id = performance_data.supplier_id WHERE performance_score > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, supplier_type FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, risk_level FROM suppliers ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE risk_level > 2;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_score, delivery_time_days FROM suppliers JOIN performance_data ON suppliers.supplier_id = performance_data.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, location FROM supplier_info ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_info WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, quality_rating FROM performance_data WHERE delivery_time < 5;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM performance_data GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT name, location, contact_email FROM supplier_info WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT ri.*, pi.revenue FROM risk_vendors ri INNER JOIN performance_data pi ON ri.supplier_id = pi.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE risk_level = 'high';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating, performance_date FROM suppliers INNER JOIN performance_data ON suppliers.supplier_id = performance_data.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE risk_level = 'high'
SELECT * FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT product_name, suppliers.supplier_name FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.location = 'New York'

SELECT supplier_name, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM suppliers INNER JOIN performance_data ON suppliers.supplier_id = performance_data.supplier_id GROUP BY suppliers.supplier_id HAVING avg_rating > 4
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description, supplier_id FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity, price FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description, suppliers.supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT orders.order_date, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.price FROM orders INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT payments.payment_date, suppliers.supplier_name, products.product_name, payments.amount FROM payments JOIN orders ON payments.order_id = orders.order_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_performance FROM performance_data WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND performance_metric = 'Quality';
